bio: Mr. Shakil is a Supply Chain Management expert with 27+ years of experience in Consumer Discretionary and IT industries. Currently working as SVP- Organizational Resilience, Real Estate & Workplace at Gameskraft. Previously worked as Group Vice President at Ola (ANI Technologies Pvt. Ltd). Responsible for Business Resilience, Brand Assurance.

- Making Times Television Network, the first broadcast network to use social media seamlessly across marketing and content generation
- Making Times Now the no1 most engaged TV news brand on Social Media
- Achieving highest engagement levels and fastest growing fan base in the Business News genre for ET NOW 
- Taking zoOm to No.1 spot among all TV channels on Social Media, on cumulative fan following of all platforms (Twitter, Facebook, Google+, YouTube) 

- Breaking 13 year monopoly of CNBC TV18 to make ET NOW the No.1 Business News channel in India 

Social Media initiatives:

- Inculcated Social Media & Online Video culture across Times Television; playing a social media evangelist role for the content, editorial & marketing teams 
- Lead various strategic initiatives in partnerships with Facebook, Twitter, Google+, WhatsApp which resulted in effective marketing, audience engagement and content creation


Topline growth:

- Spearheaded Ad Sales Strategy for TIMES NOW, ET NOW & zoom, contributing to YoY Ad sales market share to grow from 30% to 36% for TIMES NOW & 20% to 28% for ET NOW over past 4 years.
- Formulated distribution strategy to seamlessly take the network through the Digitization

bio: Mr. Devraj is a Security expert with 37+ years of experience in Metals & Mining and Consumer Discretionary industries. Currently working as Head Of Security at Aamby Valley City. Previously worked as General Manager, Security at SLR Metaliks. Holds a Bachelor's degree in Arts from Punjab University. Worked across Metals & Mining, Mining, Surface Mining, Consumer Discretionary, Hotels. Responsible for Security Operations, Project Management, Disaster Management, Safety Management.
